thread.section_title: First Aid Kits Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of First Aid Kits Australia | firstaidkits.com.au
thread.title: Danilo
thread.title_full: First Aid Kits Australia reviewed by Danilo

author: Danilo
title: Danilo
text: I ordered a TENS and EMS machine from first aid website and in less than an hour, the customer service contacted me to let me know that the machine that I had ordered was out of stock! They suggested me that I could wait around one week or a free upgrade for a better machine without additional cost. Throughout all the process all staff were extremely helpful and kind. I will definitely recommend you guys.
